typeSystemDescription.name: Semantics
typeSystemDescription.vendor: Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab, Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

typeDescription.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity
typeDescription.description: Named entities refer e.g. to persons, locations, organizations and so on. They often consist of multiple tokens.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The class/category of the named entity, e.g. person, location, etc.

featureDescription.name: identifier
featureDescription.description: Identifier of the named entity, e.g. a reference into a person database.
